item.title: Mid-level WordPress Developer
item.dc:creator: alpha
item.content:encoded:
1 Overview:

When team members told us they needed more flexibility around where and how they worked, we acted, creating two options to accommodate two different styles of work. One non-negotiable principle along the way? We had to retain our deep culture of collaboration, both among ourselves and with our clients. Introducing Work From Near and Work From Anywhere at WillowTree. Learn more here. Please indicate which location(s) you're interested.

2 Job Description:

As a Product Designer at WillowTree, youll give form to ideas by being the voice and owner of product decisions. Youll drive the design direction, and then make it happen!

We understand our responsibility to create a diverse, equitable, and inclusive place within the tech industry, while pushing to make our industry more representative.

3 Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate daily with a multidisciplinary team of Software Engineers, Researchers, Strategists, and Project Managers.
  • Co-lead ideation sessions, workshops, demos, and presentations with clients on-site
  • Push for and create inclusive, accessible design for all
  • Maintain quality of the design process and ensure that when designs are translated into code they accurately reflect the design specifications.
  • Sketch, wireframe, build IA, motion design, and run usability tests
  • Design pixel perfect responsive UIs and understand that adopting common interface pattern is better for UX than reinventing the wheel
  • Ensure content strategy and design are perfectly in-sync
  • Give and receive design critique to help constantly refine and push our work

4 Required Skills:

  • Youve been designing digital products for 2+ years.
  • A portfolio that exemplifies strong visual design and a focus on defining the user experience.
  • Youve proudly shipped and launched several products.
  • You have some past experience working in an agile environment Think two-week sprints.
  • Experience effectively presenting and communicating your design decisions to clients and team members
  • Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Figma, Sketch etc.

5 Overview

  • We are a remote-first company.
  • 100% company-paid health insurance premiums for you & your dependents
  • Vacation stipend
  • Unlimited paid vacation and paid company holidays
  • Monthly wellness/gym stipend

item.title: React Developer
item.dc:creator: spiderdevs
item.content:encoded:
1 Overview:

When team members told us they needed more flexibility around where and how they worked, we acted, creating two options to accommodate two different styles of work. One non-negotiable principle along the way? We had to retain our deep culture of collaboration, both among ourselves and with our clients. Introducing Work From Near and Work From Anywhere at WillowTree. Learn more here. Please indicate which location(s) you're interested.

2 Job Description:

As a Product Designer at WillowTree, youll give form to ideas by being the voice and owner of product decisions. Youll drive the design direction, and then make it happen!

We understand our responsibility to create a diverse, equitable, and inclusive place within the tech industry, while pushing to make our industry more representative.

3 Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate daily with a multidisciplinary team of Software Engineers, Researchers, Strategists, and Project Managers.
  • Co-lead ideation sessions, workshops, demos, and presentations with clients on-site
  • Push for and create inclusive, accessible design for all
  • Maintain quality of the design process and ensure that when designs are translated into code they accurately reflect the design specifications.
  • Sketch, wireframe, build IA, motion design, and run usability tests
  • Design pixel perfect responsive UIs and understand that adopting common interface pattern is better for UX than reinventing the wheel
  • Ensure content strategy and design are perfectly in-sync
  • Give and receive design critique to help constantly refine and push our work

4 Required Skills:

  • Youve been designing digital products for 2+ years.
  • A portfolio that exemplifies strong visual design and a focus on defining the user experience.
  • Youve proudly shipped and launched several products.
  • You have some past experience working in an agile environment Think two-week sprints.
  • Experience effectively presenting and communicating your design decisions to clients and team members
  • Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Figma, Sketch etc.

5 Overview

  • We are a remote-first company.
  • 100% company-paid health insurance premiums for you & your dependents
  • Vacation stipend
  • Unlimited paid vacation and paid company holidays
  • Monthly wellness/gym stipend

item.dc:creator: jewel
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: jewel
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://jobus.spider-themes.net.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: imranju
item.content:encoded:
Jobus

Complete Job Board & Hiring Platform that match your brand

Jobus helps you create a complete job portal post jobs, manage applications, and connect employers with job seekers seamlessly. Everything you need to run a professional job board inside WordPress Get Free Explore Features Buy Jobus

All-in-One Job Board Features

Everything you need to create, manage, and grow a professional job portal from posting jobs to managing applications, all in one place.

Unlimited Job Posting

Post as many job listings as you want without limits. ideal for growing businesses and large recruitment platforms.

Advanced Search & Filters

Enable job seekers to find the right jobs faster with powerful search functionality and smart filtering options.

Responsive Modern Layouts

Beautiful and mobile-friendly design that looks great on every device and screen size automatically.

Customizable Appearance

Easily customize colors and layouts to match your brand. Jobus lets you personalize everything without coding skills.

Pre-made Templates PRO

Get started instantly with beautifully designed pre-made templates. Customize them to fit your brand and launch in minutes.

Applicant TrackingPRO

Manage every candidate effortlessly with built-in applicant tracking. Review, shortlist, and hire fasterall from your dashboard.

See All Features

Smart Dashboards for Every User

Give employers and candidates their own intuitive spaces designed for effortless job posting, application tracking, and profile management.

Employer dashboard

Manage job posts, track applicants, and review performance insights all in one powerful employer dashboard.

  • Post and manage unlimited job listings
  • Track application status in real-time
  • Save and organize candidate profiles
  • View detailed analytics and insights

Candidate dashboard

Manage resumes, view applications, and find new jobs all from your easy-to-use Candidate Dashboard.

  • Browse and apply for jobs seamlessly
  • Track all your applications in one place
  • Manage and update your resume anytime
  • Save jobs for later review

How It Works

Get your professional job board up and running in just three simple steps. No technical expertise required.

1

Install & Activate

Download Jobus from WordPress plugin repository, install it on your site, and activate with one click. Quick setup wizard guides you through.

2

Configure & Customize

Set up your job categories, configure dashboard settings, and customize the look to match your brand perfectly using our intuitive interface.

3

Publish & Manage

Start posting jobs, reviewing applications, and managing everything effortlessly from one powerful, easy-to-use dashboard.

A Complete Hiring Ecosystem, Built for WordPress

Jobus isnt just another job plugin its a professional platform for seamless hiring. From posting jobs to tracking candidates, everything runs smoothly inside WordPress.

Job Option

Configure all job-related settings including archive and details page options for better job listings and presentation.

  • Customizable archive layouts
  • Advanced job detail pages
  • Smart filtering options

Company Option

Manage company listing preferences, archive display options, and company detail page appearance.

  • Customizable archive layouts
  • Advanced company detail pages
  • Smart filtering options

Candidate Option

Customize the candidate profiles, archive layout, and individual detail pages for a more personalized candidate showcase.

  • Customizable archive layouts
  • Candidate detail pages
  • Smart candidate specification
http://jobus.spider-themes.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/Candidate-Options.mp4http://jobus.spider-themes.net/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/Log-in-Options.mp4

Login Form Settings

Customize login fields, manage user access, and control authentication options from plugin settings.

  • Signup button label
  • Advanced custom redirects page
  • Signup button URL

Launch Your Job Board with Jobus

Everything you need to create a professional job portal. Post unlimited jobs, manage applications, and connect employers with talent seamlessly.

Free Version Buy Now

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: imranju
item.content:encoded:
Pre-made Templates PRO

Get started instantly with beautifully designed pre-made templates. Customize them to fit your brand and launch in minutes.

Applicant Tracking PRO

Manage every candidate effortlessly with built-in applicant tracking. Review, shortlist, and hire fasterall from your dashboard.

Employer Dashboard PRO

Give employers complete control to manage job posts, track applications, and update company profiles all from one dashboard.

Candidate Dashboard PRO

Allow candidates to manage resumes, monitor job applications, and save favorite listings through an easy-to-use interface.

Custom Widgets & Shortcodes PRO

Insert dynamic content anywhere on your site using built-in widgets and shortcodes that blend perfectly with any layout.

Multiple Layouts PRO

Choose from multiple pre-designed layouts for jobs, companies, and candidates to match your websites style and branding.

Favorite jobs/bookmarking PRO

Allow candidates to save and bookmark preferred jobs, making it easy to revisit and apply later.

Analytics & reporting PRO

Analyze job views, applications, and candidate interactions with detailed reports to measure success and improve strategies.

Assign company to job post PRO

Link each job post to a specific company, keeping listings organized and improving employer visibility on your site.

Custom job application form PRO

Collect applications your way by linking custom forms or Google Forms for a fully personalized recruitment process.

SMTP settings PRO

Configure SMTP settings to ensure reliable email delivery for job alerts, applications, and notifications directly from your WordPress site.

Secure Login & Password Reset PRO

Choose from multiple clean, professional layouts for jobs, companies, and candidates to match your brand style.

Customizable Appearance

Easily customize colors and layouts to match your brand. Jobus lets you personalize everything without coding skills.

Unlimited Job Posting

Post as many job listings as you want without limits. ideal for growing businesses and large recruitment platforms.

Featured Jobs

Highlight special job listings with a featured badge to attract more visibility and engagement.

Location-Based Job Listings

Add and display job listings by location, helping candidates find opportunities that match their preferred areas easily.

Elementor Widgets

Easily build custom job pages using Elementor widgets, including job listings, categories, companies, search forms, and job tabs.

Custom User Roles

Separate login and dashboard access for employers and candidates, ensuring organized, secure, and role-specific management of all users.

Advanced Search & Filters

Enable job seekers to find the right jobs faster with powerful search functionality and smart filtering options.

Responsive Modern Layouts

Beautiful and mobile-friendly design that looks great on every device and screen size automatically.

Social Sharing

Easily share job listings across social media platforms to increase visibility and attract more qualified candidates.

Frontend Job Submission

Allow employers to post jobs directly from the frontend, making job submission simple, fast, and user-friendly.

item.title: Candidate Dashboard
item.dc:creator: imranju
item.content:encoded:
Dashboard

Get an overview of your activities, recent job applications, and profile statistics in one convenient place.

My Profile

Manage your personal details, update your information, and ensure your candidate profile stays professional and complete.

Resume

Create, edit, and showcase your resume with detailed education, experience, and skill information for employers to review.

Applied Jobs

Track all the jobs youve applied for, view their status, and stay updated on employer responses easily.

Saved Jobs

Save your favorite job listings to review or apply later without losing any opportunities.

Change Password

Update your account password anytime to keep your candidate profile and personal information secure.

item.title: Employer Dashboard
item.dc:creator: imranju
item.content:encoded:
Dashboard

View a quick summary of your companys job postings, candidate interactions, and overall recruitment performance.

My Profile

Edit company information, upload a logo, and present your brand professionally to attract the best candidates.

My Jobs

Manage all your posted jobs, view applicants, and make updates to existing job listings efficiently.

Submit Job

Post new job openings quickly by filling out essential details to reach suitable candidates instantly.

Saved Candidates

Save promising candidate profiles for future reference or contact them later for suitable openings.

Change Password

Secure your employer account by updating your password regularly to prevent unauthorized access.
item.excerpt:encoded: Post new jobs, track applications, and manage saved candidates all in one clean, intuitive dashboard designed for smart employers.

item.title: How to Build a Professional Job Board in WordPress in 2025?
item.dc:creator: minhaz
item.content:encoded:
The way we work has fundamentally changed. The rise of remote opportunities, the gig economy, and hyper-specialized industries has transformed the hiring landscape. In 2025, generic, oversized job boards like Indeed or LinkedIn are often too noisy. Employers get flooded with irrelevant applications, and qualified candidates struggle to find the perfect-fit opportunities buried in a sea of listings.

This creates a massive opportunity.

The future of hiring is niche. A professional, well-run, and targeted job boardone for "Remote AI Engineers," "Sustainable Fashion Careers in Europe," or "Local Tech Startups in Austin"provides immense value. It connects the right employers with the right talent, building a community and a profitable business in the process.

But how do you, as an entrepreneur, an agency, or an industry expert, build one?

You don't need to code a platform from scratch. The answer is WordPress. With its unparalleled flexibility and a massive ecosystem, WordPress is the perfect foundation. But it needs an engine. This guide will walk you through, step-by-step, how to build a professional, monetizable, and "geo-optimized" job board in WordPress in 2025, using a complete hiring platform.

Why Choose WordPress for Your Job Board in 2025?

WordPress has evolved dramatically by 2025, with Gutenberg's full-site editing (FSE) now standard in version 6.5+, offering drag-and-drop customization without coding. Its ecosystem boasts over 60,000 plugins, including AI-enhanced tools for SEO and personalization. For job boards, WordPress excels due to its low barrier to entryideal for solopreneurs in cities like Austin or Berlinand scalability for enterprise-level sites handling thousands of daily listings.

Key advantages in 2025:

  • Cost-Effectiveness: Start for under $100/year with hosting from providers like SiteGround or Bluehost, optimized for global CDNs to serve users in high-traffic areas like Los Angeles or Manchester.
  • Mobile-First Responsiveness: With 70% of job searches happening on mobile (per Google Analytics 2025 trends), themes ensure lightning-fast loading.
  • Integration-Ready: Native support for APIs like Google for Jobs and LinkedIn, plus geo-targeting via plugins for location-based searches (e.g., "jobs near me in Chicago")
  • Security and Compliance: Built-in GDPR/CCPA tools, crucial for EU and U.S. markets handling sensitive resume data.

Introducing Jobus: Your Complete Job Board & Hiring Platform

Jobus is a powerful and versatile WordPress plugin designed to create professional job, company, and candidate listing pages. With its intuitive interface and extensive feature set, Jobus streamlines the hiring process by allowing employers and candidates to register and manage their profiles easily. The plugin provides a complete recruitment solutionno coding required.

Key Features of Jobus

  • Unlimited Job Posting:
    Theres no limit to how many jobs you can post. Create and manage unlimited job listings effortlessly.
  • Unlimited Candidates & Applications:
    Handle unlimited candidate profiles and job applications with ease using a simple, intuitive interface.
  • Unlimited Job Specifications:
    Add and manage detailed job specifications for each listing to help applicants understand requirements clearly.
  • WordPress UI Integration:
    Manage job listings, candidates, and companies directly within the familiar WordPress dashboard environment.
  • Location-Based Job Listings:
    Assign specific job locations to each post, allowing users to filter and find jobs by region or city.
  • Job Application Management:
    Enable job seekers to apply directly from each job post using a built-in and user-friendly form.
  • Applicant Tracking:
    Easily track and review all applications, view applicant details, and manage hiring in one centralized place.
  • User Account Pages:
    Provide dedicated dashboards for employers and candidates to manage their profiles and listings conveniently.
  • Custom User Roles:
    Define and assign specific user roles for employers, candidates, and administrators to ensure organized management.
  • Featured Jobs:
    Highlight special job listings with a featured badge to attract more visibility and engagement.
  • Social Sharing:
    Allow visitors to share job listings across multiple social media platforms with a single click.
  • Customizable Appearance:
    Easily customize the look and feel of your job portal to perfectly match your websites branding.
  • Pre-Made Templates:
    Use ready-to-go templates for job listings, companies, and candidate pages to save time and design effort.
  • Multiple Layouts:
    Choose from different pre-designed layouts for jobs, companies, and candidates to suit your preferred style.
  • Custom Minimal Design:
    Enjoy a clean, modern, and minimal interface focused on usability and enhanced user experience.

Heres how to build your site using this powerful platform.

Step 1: Installation and Activation

You can install Jobus in two ways:

  • Direct Installation from the WordPress Repository Search for Jobus in your WordPress dashboard under Plugins Add New, then install and activate it directly.
  • Manual Installation via ZIP File Download the Jobus plugin ZIP file, go to Plugins Add New Upload Plugin, upload the file, and click Install Now and Activate.

Step 2: Configure Jobus basic settings

After successfully installing and activating the plugin, youll see a Jobus menu added to your WordPress dashboard sidebar. From there, you can access and manage all the plugins features and settings.

Step 3: Implementing Key Features with Jobus

Jobus turns basics into powerhouses. Here's how to layer features:

Job Posting and Management

Employers log in to /employer-dashboard, upload listings with rich media (videos for 2025's visual hiring). Jobus auto-parses applications, sorting by fit score. Set expiration (30 days) and alerts for "new barista jobs Portland."

Application Tracking and Resumes

Seekers upload PDFs; Jobus extracts data via OCR integration. Dashboards show application statuspending, interviewed, hired. 

Search and Filtering

Advanced facets: Location, salary sliders ($50k$150k), remote filters. Jobus's AJAX search loads instantly, reducing abandonment in competitive markets like Berlin's startup scene.

Employer-Seeker Connections

Chat modules and "Apply with LinkedIn" buttons foster direct outreach. 

Analytics

Jobus Dashboard tracks views, applies, and conversionsgeo-breakdowns show "60% traffic from NYC."

These features make Jobus indispensable for scalable boards.

Customizing Your Portal to Match Your Brand

Your job board must not look like a generic template. The "matches your brand" promise of Jobus is fulfilled through deep customization.

The plugin works seamlessly with the WordPress editor and popular page builders like Elementor. This means you're not locked into a rigid layout. You get a suite of "Jobus Widgets" (or blocks) that you can drag and drop to build your pages:

  • Job Search Form: Place a powerful, filterable search bar anywhere.
  • Job Listings: Display jobs in a grid or list, with options to show "Featured" listings first.
  • Categories: Show a grid of job categories (e.g., "Design," "Marketing," "Engineering").
  • Company Listings: Create a directory of all the employers registered on your site.

You can use these tools to build a fully custom homepage and job search page that reflects your niche and brand identity, all without touching a line of code.

Conclusion

Building a professional job board in WordPress in 2025 is a strategic move and with Jobus, you get everything you need in one plugin. From SEO and geo-targeting to employer dashboards and monetization, Jobus transforms your WordPress site into a full-fledged hiring platform.

Whether you're launching a local job portal in Bangladesh or a global recruitment site, Jobus helps you match your brand, streamline hiring, and grow your community of employers and job seekers.

Ready to build your job board? Start with WordPress, install Jobus, and let your hiring platform take off.

item.title: Top WordPress Job Board Plugins in 2025
item.dc:creator: minhaz
item.content:encoded:
Want to transform your WordPress site into a fully functional, professional job board? Whether youre creating a dedicated recruitment portal, a niche career platform, or simply adding job listings to your existing website, the right WordPress job board plugin can make all the difference.

With so many plugins available, finding one that combines ease of use, flexibility, and modern functionality can be challenging. Thats why weve handpicked the top WordPress job board plugins to help you build a complete job listing platformno coding required.

From powerful free tools to feature-rich premium options, these plugins make it easy to post and manage jobs, handle applications, and even generate revenue from listings. Lets dive into the best solutions to help you get started.

What Are WordPress Job Board Plugins?

A WordPress job board plugin is a specialized tool that lets you add job posting and application functionality to your WordPress sitewithout needing custom development. These plugins turn your website into a fully functional WordPress job board, allowing you to list open positions, accept applications, and manage job listings with ease.

Whether youre creating a niche job marketplace, a company careers page, or a community hiring portal, a job board plugin for WordPress provides features like:

  • Job submission forms for employers
  • Application tracking for site admins
  • Frontend listings for visitors
  • Filters for location, job type, and category
  • Paid listings or monetization options

In short, the best WordPress job board plugins offer everything you need to launch and manage a job board directly from your WordPress dashboardsaving time, money, and development headaches.

What to look for in a job board plugin

Before choosing a plugin, here are some important things to check. Think of these as must-haves.

  1. Easy to use
    • The plugin should let you add jobs, manage applications, and allow job seekers to apply, without needing to write code.
    • If its too complicated, it will slow you down.
  2. Good for both employers and job-seekers
    • Employers should be able to post jobs, edit them, and extend deadlines.
    • Job-seekers should be able to browse, apply, and upload a resume if needed.
    • A good plugin supports both roles well.
  3. Search/filtering options
    • A job board is only useful if people can find the right job. That means you need filters (by location, job type, keywords).
    • Without search, listings just pile up and become hard to use.
  4. Works with your current website design/theme
    • The plugin should match or at least not break your websites look.
    • If you use page-builders (like Elementor) youll want a plugin compatible with that.
  5. Scalable & supported
    • Will the plugin be safe (updates, bug fixes)?
    • Does it have good reviews, active support?
    • Also check if it handles many listings (if you expect lots).
  6. Extras (nice-to-have)
    • Employer/candidate dashboards.
    • Monetisation (paid listings, featured jobs).
    • Integration with other tools (forms, email alerts).

Best WordPress job board plugins in 2025

Here are the best WordPress job board plugins that are power-packed, easy to use, and feature-rich.

1. Jobus

This is a newer plugin, but very promising. According to its listing:

  • It allows unlimited job postings, unlimited candidates/applications.
  • It has nice pre-made templates for job listing pages, company pages, and candidate pages.
  • It supports the popular page builder Elementor (so you can design nicely) via widgets.
  • Its built for WordPress 6.0+ and PHP 7.4+ (so modern).

Why you might pick Jobus

  • If you want a sleek, modern job board with lots of features.
  • If you want a plugin that handles both sides (employer + candidate).
  • If youre comfortable trying something a bit newer and want flexibility.

Potential drawbacks

  • Because its relatively new, it may have fewer third-party addons or fewer people using it (so less long-term field experience).
  • If you rely on very niche features (monetisation, advanced filters), youll need to check whether they are fully supported.

2. WP Job Portal

WP Job Portal is a comprehensive WordPress job board plugin designed to simplify HR tasks and improve the hiring process. This lightweight plugin is shortcode-based, making it compatible with multiple themes and easy to manage without the need for coding.

It provides an array of features that allow businesses to create a job listing page or a complete job board. WP Job Portal supports multiple languages and offers extensive customization options to fit diverse business needs. The plugin is compatible with WordPress versions 4.8 and above.

Best Features

1. Allows job seekers to refine their search based on classification, location, and salary range.
2. Simplifies the application process for candidates and allows employers to manage applications from their dashboard.
3. Provides the option to add custom fields to the registration form.
4. Enables job seekers to save jobs for later reference.
5. Auto-fills online resumes from uploaded files to save time.
6. Allows admin to add multiple types of custom fields for companies, jobs, and resumes.
7. Offers multiple color schemes to enhance the plugins appearance.

Compatibility and Integrations

WP Job Portal is compatible with most WordPress themes. It also integrates with popular WordPress builders like Elementor, Beaver Builder, Divi, and Gutenberg.

3. Simple Job Board

Simple Job Board is a user-friendly and lightweight WordPress job board plugin developed by PressTigers. This plugin is perfect for businesses looking to add a job board to their WordPress website without any hassle. With Simple Job Board, you can manage various job openings, add multiple job listings, create customized application forms for each job post, and more.

The plugin supports multiple languages and is compatible with the latest version of WordPress. It also offers an array of features in its free version, making it a cost-effective solution for businesses of all sizes.

Best Features

1. Pre-configured and ready to use immediately after installation.
2. Customizable appearance to match with your websites theme.
3. Allows for multi-company job postings.
4. Application form builder for creating unlimited customized job application forms.
5. Receive applications via email and store them in the admin panel.
6. Option to add unlimited job specifications.
7. Taxonomy options to manage job categories, types, tags, and location.

Compatibility and Integrations

Simple Job Board is fully compatible with WPML and WordPresss native translation features. It also offers a mobile app for Android and iOS for managing your job board on the go.

4. Job Manager & Career

The Job Manager & Career plugin is a comprehensive WordPress job board plugin designed to simplify the process of managing job listings and recruitments on your website. This job board plugin for WordPress enables users to set up a career feed using a simple shortcode, allowing you to add job details like title, description, location, job type, and category with ease.

Besides creating an interactive job portal, it offers advanced features like resume upload in multiple formats, social sharing for jobs, and customization of job application forms. This job board plugin for WordPress supports is compatible with the latest WordPress versions and is regularly updated to ensure optimal performance and security.

Best Features

1. Easy addition and management of job posts.
2. Ability to list jobs under different categories, locations, and types.
3. Multiple methods to apply for a job post.
4. Special badges for urgent jobs.
5. Resume uploads in multiple formats.
6. Option to display expired or filled jobs.
7. Social sharing for jobs.

Compatibility and Integrations

Job Manager & Career plugin is compatible with most WordPress themes and page builders, ensuring seamless integration into your existing website design. It also supports various third-party plugins for enhanced functionality.

5. JobBoardWP

JobBoardWP is a robust WordPress job board plugin that allows users to seamlessly integrate a job board into their website. Its interface includes a modern, clean design thats user-friendly, enabling job seekers to search for jobs and employers to submit job listings. The plugin supports a wide range of WordPress versions and is known for its lightweight structure and easy-to-use functionality.

In addition to job submissions, the plugin allows employers to manage their job listings via a dedicated job dashboard. The plugin also offers Google structured data support, allowing job listings to appear in Googles job search results, thereby enhancing the visibility of your job posts.

Best Features

1. Three front-end pages: Jobs page, Post Job page, and Jobs Dashboard page.
2. Admin control for managing job listings and creating new job posts.
3. Built-in job types with customizable tag colors.
4. Customizable job categories for more accurate job listings.
5. Detailed settings for personalizing the look and function of the job board.
6. Email enable/disable function with editable email text.
7. Google structured data to boost job listings visibility.

Compatibility and Integrations

JobBoardWP, a versatile job board plugin for WordPress, is compatible with most WordPress themes, ensuring a seamless integration with your sites design. It doesnt mention specific integrations, but its flexibility makes it adaptable to a wide range of WordPress configurations.

Final Thoughts

Building a professional job board on WordPress is easier than ever in 2025. Jobus stands out for its modern design, flexibility, and feature-rich approach. With unlimited job postings, candidate management, and pre-built templates, it provides a polished experience for both employers and job seekers. Its Elementor integration makes customization simple, allowing you to create a professional job board quicklywithout any coding.

item.title: Changelog
item.dc:creator: sajjad
item.content:encoded:
22 October 2025 1.0.0

Init Initial release

Version
  • Version 1.0.0

31 Oct 2025 1.1.0

New New Color Settings added in the General Settings panel

New Body class support for better theme styling control

Fixed Company dashboard and employment dashboard layout issues resolved

Fixed Job page CSS and single page layout issues fixed for consistent styling

Fixed PHP errors in templates resolved and templating system improved

Fixed Theme compatibility issues fixed across multiple themes (Astra, Docy, Twenty Twenty-Five)

Fixed Archive layout issue fixed for Astra theme

Fixed Dashboard employer lock issue fixed for candidate save functionality

Improved Job, Candidate & Company Single Pages redesigned for better readability and structure

Improved Templates refined and redundant fonts removed for cleaner performance

Improved Shortcode functionality enhanced with layout attributes and conditional loading for header/footer in archive templates

Improved Elementor widget lock and related UI refined for better editing experience

Improved Appearance and General Settings organization improved for easier configuration

Improved Subscribe field color adjusted for better visibility in dark mode

Improved Setup and color schema refined for a consistent user experience

Compatibility Astra theme compatibility improved for single and archive layouts

Compatibility GeneratePress theme compatibility added and tested

Compatibility Twenty Twenty-Five theme compatibility improved across all single and dashboard pages

Compatibility Docy theme compatibility refined for smoother integration

Optimized Main CSS prefix optimized to avoid conflicts and improve code maintainability

22 October 2025 1.0.0

Init Initial release

Version
  • Version 1.0.0
    • Version 1.1.0
